scripts.dev:apps: echo concurrently -n ad,pr  "npm run dev:local --workspace @xs/admin-app" "npm run dev:local --workspace @xs/landing-app"
scripts.deploy:dev: export FIREBASE_DEPLOY_ENV=dev && firebase deploy -P dev --except functions
scripts.deploy:production: export FIREBASE_DEPLOY_ENV=prod && firebase deploy -P prod --except functions
